chatty.description: Make the console say something stupid when it starts.  It's mostly a way to test the text-to-speech feature.

firewire-protocol.description: Protocol used for all FireWire communications.  This applies wether the controllers are connected to the computer using FireWired or Ethernet (UDP with Link-Local).

port.description: Port used communicate between the computer and the dVRK controllers.  Accepted values are "fw", "fw:X" (X is FireWire port), "udp" or "udp:xx.xx.xx.xx" (xx.xx.xx.xx is the IP address of the dVRK controller.  Default controller address is 169.254.0.100.  Values are parsed by `BasePort::ParseOptions` in library Amp1394.

footpedals.description: IO configuration file used to define inputs from the foot pedals.  See files `sawRobotIO1394-*-foot-pedals.xml` in directory `share/io`.
